name: Smart Cookie Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Our product developers are real smart cookies! They’ve created an unbelievably tasty, gluten-free cookie dough with a neutral base so you can bake up cookies to accommodate any allergens, dietary constraints, preferences—and occasions! Make chocolate chip, oatmeal raisin, and white chocolate macadamia cookies—or just about any combo you’re craving. Let your favourite flavours guide you, and get your kids involved in the baking process and let their inner baker shine!
